com.qtplaf.library.swing.core

Class JPanelFormFields

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • com.qtplaf.library.swing.core.JPanelFormFields
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class JPanelFormFields
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    A panel that holds a grid form of fields from a record. Domains are layed out in tabs by field group if there are field groups, and optionally in sub-panels defined by (gridx, gridy) values.

    Usage:

    • Instantiate the panel.
    • Set the edit mode.
    • Set the master record.
    • Add fields optionally indicating the grid coordinates of the sub-panel.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • addField

        public void addField(java.lang.String alias,
                     int gridx,
                     int gridy)
        Add a field setting its grid coordinates. Grid coordinates are relative to the field group of the field, that is, the tab where the field group will be assigned. Grid coordinates are recomended to be set sequentially.
        Parameters:
        alias - The field alias.
        gridx - The grid x coordinate.
        gridy - The grid y coordinate.

      • getClearEditFieldNames

        private java.util.List<java.lang.String> getClearEditFieldNames(Field field,
                                                                java.util.List<Field> fields,
                                                                Relation skipRelation)
        Returns the list of clear edit field names. If the field is a segment of another multi-segment relation, add clear fields for the rest of the multi-segment fields.
        Parameters:
        field - Scan field.
        fields - List of fields.
        skipRelation - Relation to skip.
        Returns:
        The list of field names.
